amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement the European Union's Emissions Trading Scheme.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for furtherance of the implementation of the European Union greenhouse gas emissions trading scheme for aviation activities established by European Union Directive 2008/101/EC.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Cravaack.
